entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 33. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
